Bed Products.description: Bed Extender - Associated Accessories
Bed Products.extendedCFD: Bed Extender by Lund. Expand the cargo capacity of your Sierra 1500 pickup truck with this Bed Extender. It is designed to swing out to provide additional functional length over an open tailgate or swing in to create a contained cargo area within the bed and is compatible with Bedliners and Tonneau Covers. Cargo and load capacity for your Sierra 1500 are limited by weight and distribution. Secure loose items before driving. Color: Powder Coated Black Aluminum or Silver. Non-GM warranty. Lightweight, rustproof and non-corrosive, it provides easy access to the truck bed by letting you flip the cover open from the front or back. This towing camera package provides convenient, driver-activated camera views through the 4-inch or 8-inch MyLink radio screens. It features six manual touch-screen menu options, offering multiple vantage points of the side and rear of the vehicle. The Intellihaul Trailering Camera System is an Associated Accessory sourced from EchoMaster, an independent supplier and is not warranted by GM or its dealers. exterior.mechanical.extendedCFD: with overdrive and tow/haul mode. Includes Cruise Grade Braking and Powertrain Grade Braking, (STD)
exterior.mechanical.longCFD:
This smooth-shifting electronically controlled transmission with overdrive includes:

Tow/Haul mode
  • Raises transmission upshift points to provide more power to accelerate with a trailer or heavy load
  • Raises downshift points to use engine compression to help slow the truck instead of merely braking

Powertrain Grade Braking

  • Automatically uses the engine and transmission to slow the truck to maintain desired speeds when driving downhill
  • Reduces brake wear and increases vehicle control

Cruise Grade Braking

  • Downshifts automatically to slow the truck as it drives downhill if it exceeds the cruise set speed by a certain amount

Available to order with 5.3L EcoTec3 V8 engine.
To help ease cold weather starts, the available engine block heater heats the engine and engine block fluids.

exterior.mechanical.primaryName: LPO, Underbody Shield Package, transfer case protection

exterior.mechanical.longCFD:
Available trailer brake controller:

  • Integrated with the antilock brake system (ABS) 
  • Helps provide immediate and measured brake force signaling to electric-controlled trailer brake systems
  • No requirement for external or aftermarket brake control systems
  • Requires available trailering equipment
  • Included with available Max Trailering Package

• Standard on 4WD models
  • On 2WD models, requires available Off-Road Suspension Package or Elevation Package on Sierra and SLE trims

• Requires available 5.3L EcoTec3 V8 engine
  • Included with available All Terrain X Package

These luxurious leather-appointed bucket seats offer personalized comfort for the driver and front passenger. The seats feature:

interior.options.extendedCFD: (7 speaker system including subwoofer when ordered with bucket seats), includes (NKC) noise control system.)
interior.options.longCFD:
The premium Bose® audio system features 6 speakers plus subwoofer located throughout the cabin for rich, clear acoustics. It includes:
  • Active Noise Cancellation system when ordered with the 6.2L EcoTec3 V8 engine and bucket seats
  • 7-speaker system with subwoofer when ordered with bucket seats
This feature is included in the All Terrain Package, SLT Value Package, SLT Crew Cab Premium Plus Package or the Texas SLT Value Package. This feature is required with combination of available 6.2L EcoTec3 V8 engine and leather bucket seats.

This audio system includes 6 speakers positioned throughout the cabin for good sound quality and an enjoyable listening experience. It also includes Active Noise Cancellation technology that:
  • Actively listens for unwanted engine sound through speakers within the cabin
  • Generates an opposite wave sound from the audio system speakers to cancel out the offending noise
  • Provides good sound control that allows the engine to be tuned for optimal fuel efficiency at all rpms
This feature is included with the 6.2L EcoTec3 V8 engine when the bench seat is ordered.

transmission.extendedCFD: with overdrive and tow/haul mode. Includes Cruise Grade Braking and Powertrain Grade Braking, (STD)
transmission.longCFD:
This smooth-shifting electronically controlled transmission with overdrive includes:

Tow/Haul mode
  • Raises transmission upshift points to provide more power to accelerate with a trailer or heavy load
  • Raises downshift points to use engine compression to help slow the truck instead of merely braking

Powertrain Grade Braking

  • Automatically uses the engine and transmission to slow the truck to maintain desired speeds when driving downhill
  • Reduces brake wear and increases vehicle control

Cruise Grade Braking

  • Downshifts automatically to slow the truck as it drives downhill if it exceeds the cruise set speed by a certain amount
